Name: [Affinity] Fully Charged
Desc: Anby has evoked the Mindscape: <color=#FFAF2C>[Charging Field]</color> After launching a Dash Attack or Dodge Counter, your character can <color=#2BAD00>immediately follow up with</color> certain attacks near the end of the Basic Attack combo.
Desc2: Anby has had enough rest, and she's now ready for a big fight. Wherever she goes, she can hear the crackling of electricity around her.
